DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine culturally focus psychiatric ( CFP ) consultation service improve depressive symptom increase diagnosis treatment depression Asian American Latino American primary care patient Massachusetts General Hospital .
DOC.brief_title: Culturally-focused Consultation Asian Americans Latino Americans
DOC.detailed_description: This study 's aim determine culturally focus mental health consultation help Latino Asian Americans experience sadness , stress , symptom depression . Eligible adult must already primary care physician Massachusetts General Hospital . In study , patient randomly assign , like flip coin , receive culturally focus intervention treatment usual . Those receive intervention three session study personnel , generally discuss learn technique deal mental health . Those receive treatment usual , mean regular care receive primary care practice , two session study personnel generally discuss mental health . All study visit patient material provide patient ' language choice - English , Spanish , Mandarin , Cantonese , Vietnamese . All patient compensate complete study visit . About half study patient arm also invite participate optional qualitative interview , ask question expectation research study idea improve culturally sensitive mental health service . In addition , small sample Asian American patient participate study PCPs sit study conduct contacted qualitative interview . This interview address reason Asian American recruitment study challenge .
DOC.criteria: Capable give informed consent Adults 18 year age old Members either Asian American Latino American minority group Currently experience depressive symptom Active unstable , untreated psychiatric illness preclude participation study
